Summary: single light at first then last night 6 to 8 lights in a row.
trends: There have been no other sightings in State Road

divs: Sighting DetailsI have been seeing the orange lights for 2 weeks now and there never in the same spot but last night i seen 6 lights in a row,about the size of a football field,hover move back and forth a few times go below the tree line then go back up tilt level out move up above the tree line then vanish.I tried to record and take a picture it showed up in the view finder perfect but when i recorded it and snapped a photo everything was just black.
